structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Enforcement Orders; Civil Administrative Penalties; Actions By Attorney General; Punishment

text.section: Violate or assist in the violation of any of the provisions of this chapter or of any rules and regulations adopted hereunder;
Fail to comply with any order by the department;
Make a water withdrawal contrary to the terms and conditions of the chapter, or of any regulation adopted or permit or order issued hereunder; or
Attempt to obtain a permit by misrepresentation or failure to disclose all relevant facts.
